thread.title: Was Jesus a Myth? A Debate Featuring Dr. Robert Price and Dr. Bart Ehrman
thread.title_full: Was Jesus a Myth? A Debate Featuring Dr. Robert Price and Dr. Bart Ehrman

author: Hemant Mehta
title: Was Jesus a Myth? A Debate Featuring Dr. Robert Price and Dr. Bart Ehrman
text:
March 27, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
Last October, Dr. Bart Ehrman and Dr. Robert Price had a debate over whether Jesus actually existed. That conversation, sponsored by Mythicist Milwaukee , is now online. 
Ehrman argued that there’s enough evidence to support a historical Jesus while Price said Jesus was nothing more than a mythological figure. 
Matt Dillahunty served as the moderator, and he gave his own talk on the subject the following day. 
I haven’t had a chance to watch the entire debate, but if any moments stand out, please leave a timestamp/summary in the comments below.
